Next: An example vise implementation, Previous: Introduction, Up: Introduction   [Contents]

1 Overview

vise is a virtual machine specialized for generating output for clients that have strict output size constaints.

Specifically, the original target enviromnent was USSD menu navigation and session handling.

  • Features
  • Contents

1.1 Features

1.2 Contents

  • Virtual machine

1.2.1 Virtual machine

This component processes menu navigation from client input, and executes

  • Virtual machine to handle menu navigation.
  • Assembly mini-language to script for the virtual machine.
  • Code interface for external calls.
